data.eml:eml: A new species of the Phanoperla pallipennis group (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mo, Raorao, Yan, Yanhua, Wang, Guoquan, Li, Weihai (2019): A new species of the Phanoperla pallipennis group (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 4656 (1): 183-188, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4656.1.11
